automotive.title: SafeChem
automotive.label: Accepts garage/automotive products, home & garden products, workshop/paint supplies and many other miscellaneous products.

construction.title: Full Circle Recycle: Recycling Aggregates
construction.label: Accepts concrete, asphalt, ceramic and porcelain toilets/sinks, stone and gravel.

construction.title: Pitsch Companies
construction.label: Accepts and sells most deconstruction and building materials. Accepts yard waste and stumps for a fee.

glass.title: Habitat Kent South ReStore
glass.label: Accepts new and gently used building materials and home improvement products for resale at discounted prices, including lumber, trim, stain/paint, windows, doors, working appliances, furniture, flooring, etc.  Accepts vehicles for donation.

glass.title: Habitat Kent North ReStore
glass.label: Accepts new and gently used building materials and home improvement products for resale at discounted prices, including lumber, trim, stain/paint, windows, doors, working appliances, furniture, flooring, etc.  Accepts vehicles for donation.

holiday.title: Kent County Recycling & Education Center
holiday.label: Accepts residential recycling and consumer electronics. Cathode Ray Tube (CRT) monitors & TVs are not accepted at this location.

holiday.title: City of Grand Rapids Recycling & Refuse
holiday.label: Operates curbside recycling, trash, and yard waste programs.  Operates a yard waste drop-off facility. Fees may apply.

metal.title: Padnos
metal.label: Accepts scrap metals, wire, radiators, appliances, plastics, office and household electronics, computer components and accessories, satellite (DISH or Direct TV) dishes, and other e-waste.

metal.title: Grand Rapids Iron & Metal
metal.label: Accepts automotive batteries and any type of scrap metal.

packaging.title: Arvron
packaging.label: Accepts non-food, clean, block-style Styrofoam only.

packaging.title: Pak Mail Grand Rapids NW
packaging.label: Accepts clean, square foam blocks or sheets, packing peanuts, and bubble wrap.

paper.title: Shred-it
paper.label: Accepts confidential papers, hard drives, and other media for secure shredding and destruction.

paper.title: Rapid Green Group
paper.label: Provides shredding, medical waste disposal, solid waste disposal and recycling options for businesses and other organizations.

textiles.title: In The Image
textiles.label: Accepts gently used clothing/linens/baby items, school supplies, housewares, furniture, large appliances & small appliances, personal care items, kitchen items, TVs.

textiles.title: Goodwill
textiles.label: Accepts working or broken computers/laptops/monitors, software, cameras, working flat-screen televisions (no CRT TV’s), furniture, household goods, clothing, books, etc.

batteries.title: Kent County Department of Public Works
batteries.label: Accepts rechargeable batteries.

electronic_appliances.title: Best Buy
electronic_appliances.label: Accepts TVs and videos, computers and tablets, cell phones and radios, appliances, ink and toner, rechargeable batteries, audio, home, music and movies, video games and gadgets, cameras and camcorders, car audio and video and GPS.

electronic_appliances.title: Cascade Engineering
electronic_appliances.label: Accepts electronics, cell phones, ink jet cartridges, office supplies, books, phone books, magazines, eyeglasses, sports equipment, winter clothing for children, and business attire for women.

hazardous.title: SafeChem
hazardous.label: Accepts garage/automotive products, home & garden products, workshop/paint supplies and many other miscellaneous products.

household.title: In The Image
household.label: Accepts gently used clothing/linens/baby items, school supplies, housewares, furniture, large appliances & small appliances, personal care items, kitchen items, TVs.

household.title: Goodwill
household.label: Accepts working or broken computers/laptops/monitors, software, cameras, working flat-screen televisions (no CRT TV’s), furniture, household goods, clothing, books, etc.

organic_waste.title: Organicycle
organic_waste.label: Accepts most organic waste for commercial composting.

organic_waste.title: Urban Roots
organic_waste.label: For a small monthly fee, Urban Roots will collect household compost and organic waste from your curbside.

paint.title: RepcoLite
paint.label: Accepts latex paint for a fee.

paint.title: Habitat Kent South ReStore
paint.label: Accepts new and gently used building materials and home improvement products for resale at discounted prices, including lumber, trim, stain/paint, windows, doors, working appliances, furniture, flooring, etc.  Accepts vehicles for donation.

plastic.title: Meijer
plastic.label: Accepts plastic shopping bags. Most bag recycling drop-offs are located in the entryways or lobbies of the store.
